keywords.description:
Gain 19 gold the first time played.
Gain 19 gold the second time played.
Gain 97 gold the third time played.

keywords.name: Added
keywords.description: XP which is transferred upon dealing unblocked attack damage.

keywords.name: This is displayed in the tooltip.
keywords.description: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).

keywords.name: Artifact
keywords.description: Negates the next debuff.

keywords.name: Attack
keywords.description: Take 9 damage after playing four cards.

keywords.name: Barrier
keywords.description: Prevent the next !M! times you would lose HP or Temp HP.

keywords.name: Betrayed
keywords.description: This enemy gains twice as much LV when attacked. If this enemy dies, you will no longer escape.

keywords.name: Blur
keywords.description: Block is not removed at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Copy
keywords.description:
Any buffs can only be stolen if enemy didn't start with them or they are non-permanent.
Strength and enemy LV is converted into player LV.
The card will glow if anything can be copied.

keywords.name: Countdown
keywords.description: A power that triggers an effect after a certain number of cards have been played.

keywords.name: Critical
keywords.description: Cards are Critical if in the middle of your hand or Persevered. Some cards have a bonus effect when Critical.

keywords.name: Defend
keywords.description: Gain 8 Block after playing four cards.

keywords.name: Demonify
keywords.description:
Your next Attack will end in 9
(You will gain LV until it does).

keywords.name: Determination
keywords.description: Prevent the next time you would lose HP from Attacks.

keywords.name: Detonate
keywords.description: KR deals damage as if you had lost HP or Temp HP.

keywords.name: Dexterity
keywords.description: Dexterity improves Block gained from cards.

keywords.name: Draft
keywords.description:
Choose an effect to obtain from a selection of choices.
Choose a remaining effect for the enemy.

keywords.name: Dream
keywords.description: A positive effect.

keywords.name: Evolve
keywords.description: Gain friskmod:LV whenever you play a card.

keywords.name: Expiry
keywords.description: A unique effect that occurs when a Countdown reaches 0.

keywords.name: Fallen Down
keywords.description: Receive 66% more damage from non-Attacks.

keywords.name: Ghostly
keywords.description: This card deals non-attack damage, is unaffected by Block modifiers, and isn't treated as a card played.

keywords.name: Glad Dummy
keywords.description:
Gives you 2 block on its turn.
Whenever the dummy gains a power or gains Block, so does its Soulbound target.

keywords.name: Hurt
keywords.description: This turn, target takes 1 more attack damage.

keywords.name: Inherent
keywords.description: XP which cannot be lost.

keywords.name: KR
keywords.description:
KR-inflected creatures take damage whenever you lose HP or Temp HP.
KR cannot kill on its own.

keywords.name: LV
keywords.description:
Your next Attack will gain equivalent XP.
Enemies deal equivalent extra damage.

keywords.name: LV Ritual
keywords.description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 friskmod:LV.

keywords.name: Mad Dummy
keywords.description:
Deals 3 damage to a random enemy on its turn.
Whenever the dummy takes damage, so does its Soulbound target.

keywords.name: Matching
keywords.description: Both you and the enemy must have the same Buff or Debuff.

keywords.name: Mercied
keywords.description: Attacks will deal 1 less damage for their LV or XP this turn.

keywords.name: Monochrome
keywords.description:
Monochrome cards have Ethereal and Exhaust.
They will give you one energy when played.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

keywords.name: NEO
keywords.description:
Whenever the target gains Block, it takes 1 damage.
Didn't you know NEO is famous for its high defense?

keywords.name: Nightmare
keywords.description: A negative effect.

keywords.name: Overcome
keywords.description:
When a non-friskmod:Trapped card fails to play, Persevere it and reduce by 1.
Removed on turn end.

keywords.name: Perseverable
keywords.description: This card can always be Persevered.

keywords.name: Persevere
keywords.description:
Only if a card is normally friskmod:Unplayable, play it anyway at the cost of 1 HP.
If a card is persevered, add an Trapped copy of the card to your hand. If the card is always Unplayable, exhaust it instead.

keywords.name: Pickup
keywords.description: Effect triggers when you obtain this card.

keywords.name: Pink
keywords.description: Using the COLOR field, this keyword is colored pink instead of the normal keyword color.

keywords.name: Rewind
keywords.description: The enemy's intent will be the one it was last turn. The enemy's powers will be reverted to the amount they were at at the end of the last turn, if they were greater.

keywords.name: Sip
keywords.description:
Add a card to your hand with related lesser effects.
(Will either have half the number displayed, cards restricted to 0 or 1 cost or only have a chance of being played)

keywords.name: Soulbound
keywords.description:
Soulbound to the enemy attacked.
Dies whenever the target dies.

keywords.name: Spare
keywords.description:
Escape from a non-boss combat after 12 cards have been played.
Receive no rewards.

keywords.name: Spared
keywords.description: If this enemy is attacked, they will instead gain Betrayed.

keywords.name: Steal
keywords.description:
Any buffs can only be stolen if enemy didn't start with them or they are non-permanent.
Strength and enemy LV is converted into player LV.
Enemy HP is converted into Temp HP.
The card will glow if anything can be stolen.

keywords.name: Strength
keywords.description: Strength adds additional damage to attacks.

keywords.name: Strike
keywords.description: Any card containing "Strike" in their name.

keywords.name: Temp HP
keywords.description: Until end of combat, prevents damage to HP.

keywords.name: Threatened
keywords.description: Total enemy attack damage is greater or equal to your current HP.

keywords.name: Trapped
keywords.description:
Trapped cards are Unplayable.
They cause you to lose 1 energy when drawn. Trapped cards cause you to lose 7 HP when Persevered.

keywords.name: Unplayable
keywords.description: Unplayable cards or cards that lack the conditions to be played, such as having insufficient Energy.

keywords.name: Unseal
keywords.description: Makes a Trapped card untrapped.

keywords.name: Vitality
keywords.description: Vitality improves Temp HP gained from ALL sources.

keywords.name: Vulnerable
keywords.description: Vulnerable creatures take 50% more damage from Attacks.

keywords.name: Wait
keywords.description: Triggers an effect after a certain number of cards have been played.

keywords.name: Wasted
keywords.description:
Any [E] used not playing cards.
(Such as Void, or unspent lost energy at the end of turn)

keywords.name: Weakened
keywords.description: Weakened creatures deal 25% less damage with Attacks.

keywords.name: XP
keywords.description:
Increases attack damage of this card.
Whenever unblocked damage is dealt, transfer one less LV to the target and set this card's XP to one less the target's XP.

mods.name: The Fallen Human
mods.description: Adds Frisk from UNDERTALE into Slay The Spire
